New Records: Golden State Warriors improved to 5-1 on the NBA season without Steph Curry.
The NBA admitted a missed call in the final two minutes of regulation.
Key Match Events: Draymond Green's missed sixth foul call led to Houston securing an offensive rebound and scoring.
Pre-Game Insights: Steph Curry was out, and the Warriors secured their third-straight win without him.
Curry could return soon, potentially impacting the team's performance.
Post-Match Reflections: Houston Rockets fell to 3-3 in the Western Conference standings, tying with multiple teams.
Golden State Warriors' win was significant, especially without Curry.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The NBA acknowledged the missed call, highlighting its impact on the game.
Warriors' resilience without Curry was a notable aspect.
